item.title: About
item.description:
I am currently working as a Principal Scientist at Course5 AI Lab, where my work focuses on natural language understanding and generation related to deep learning. In addition to developing Persia (a business intelligence bot that correctly identifies user queries and provides tailored responses through automated data analysis), I also revolutionized the company’s document intelligence applications, such as the Optimizer Suite, Discovery and the Text Analytics platform.

As a machine learning researcher and practitioner, my main pursuit is to design a model that is versatile, multi-modal, self-learning and easy to deploy. For more information, please see my CV.

Â 

I run this blog not only to refresh my memory about machine learning and other areas of knowledge, but also to improve my interpretation skills so that I can help as much as possible those who are also on this journey.
